verses.verse: Praise Yahweh! Praise God in his temple! Praise him who is in his fortress in heaven!
Praise him for the mighty deeds that he has performed; praise him because he is very great!
Praise him by blowing trumpets loudly; praise him by playing harps and small stringed instruments!
Praise him by beating drums and by dancing. Praise him by playing stringed instruments and by playing flutes!
Praise him by clashing cymbals; praise him by clashing very loud cymbals!
I want all living creatures to praise Yahweh! Praise Yahweh!
